gen:link.msg:message: The date reported for `NonWSWSecuredLoanContractStartDate` MUST be earlier than the date reported for `NonWSWSecuredLoanContractEndDate`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NonWswSecuredLoansSpecificationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_NonWSWSecuredLoanContractStartDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NonWswSecuredLoansSpecificationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_NonWSWSecuredLoanContractStartDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NonWswSecuredLoansSpecificationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_NonWSWSecuredLoanContractEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NonWswSecuredLoansSpecificationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_NonWSWSecuredLoanContractEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`BranchActivity` MUST be reported with `LoanNumberAxis`, because `LoanNumberAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NonWswSecuredLoansSpecificationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00LoanNumberAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NonWswSecuredLoansSpecificationConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00LoanNumberAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
